name: G-Max Depletion
effect: The Dragon-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Wyrmwind while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Reduce the target's will by 2.
description: The user channels its own dragon energy and attacks the foe, trapping it in a vortex that drains their will to fight.
